text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { long long int arr [ 100000 ] ; int n ; int i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } int count = 0 , flag = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( arr [ i ] < arr [ i + 1 ] ) count ++ ; } printf ( "%d" , ( count + n ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
